title: Cleaning Sales Data for Retail Client
description: The client had over 10,000 sales records with missing fields, mixed data types, and duplicate rows. I cleaned and normalized the data using Python and Excel.

title: Forex Journal Dashboard
description: This project focused on analyzing and visualizing XAUUSD swing trades using supply/demand, CHoCH, and entry rules on 4H and 1H charts. Final product was a dynamic Power BI dashboard and Python-generated performance stats.

title: MySQL to Power BI Integration
description: Connected a MySQL database to Power BI and Excel for real-time analytics. This helped the client understand student performance trends by school and term.
